components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Mexico From Registered Sender IDs

incident_updates.body:
We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mexico from registered sender IDs. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

This is related to a previous incident: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/gdcppb44g2kv that had been marked as resolved.

incidents.name: Toggle Voice Insights Advanced Features in Console Results in Error

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate errors seen in the console when trying to enable/disable Voice Insights Advanced Features. As a workaround, please use the REST API. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating errors seen in the console when trying to enable/disable Voice Insights advanced features. As a workaround, please use the Rest API. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating errors seen in the console when trying to enable/disable Voice Insights advanced features. As a workaround, please use the Rest API. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating errors seen in the console when trying to enable/disable Voice Insights advanced features. As a workaround, please use the Rest API. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Voice Insights in Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues With Onboarding New Numbers or Deprovisioning 10DLC Numbers

scheduled_maintenances.name: Mexico SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T Mexico

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 01July 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 02July 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner Everything Everywhere EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 02 July 2023 at 23:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.
Impacted Products: SNA, Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 31 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT
05 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 05 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT

incident_updates.body: The Mobifone network in Vietnam is conducting a planned maintenance from 5 July 2023 at 9:00 PDT until 5 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Mobifone Vietnam handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 05 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.
